_informations.appname: pretty obvious what is it for, no ?
_informations.port: port number to run flask server on
_informations.meteoToken: Token you can get at https://api.meteo-concept.com
_informations.insee: Table of insee number of the city you want weather from
_informations.rss: Dictionnary of rss feed you want
_informations.debug: true to display the error info on the website, false either
